name: Harvesting...
description:
Our UI is broken on some computers, you can take your page resolution to around %80 for it to work!

Our windows version is the most bugless one!

Hello! This is our Ludum Dare 52 submission;  Harvesting...

It's a short game of harvesting data all over the sites for some sinister reason...?

With the gameplay of 5-10 munites, you can play our game without any downloads!

It has;

-Bad Easter eggs

-Bugs! Real-looking ones! Sorry!!

-No sleep! We don't have it here lol

-We have Osu at home

-Osu at home

Thanks for playing and rating us in advance!

Developer: Irmak Erkol

Developer: Sena Fatma Genç

Developer: Barış Sinaplı

Artist: Yağmur Yılmaz

---

Thanks for playing and rating us in advance!

---

Assets we used: 

Osu sound: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/positive-beeps-85504/

Pixabay - positive_beeps | Royalty Free Music

Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/the-8-bit-jukebox-lite-music-pack-70436
